Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameActionHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameActionHandler
public class GameActionHandler extends Object
This class represents the collection of methods and game finite state machine that allow the actual controller in MVC pattern to execute methods and requests by the player and verify that these requests are actually correct. In this class, all possible user actions are translated and verified

    • handleAction

      public void handleAction(ActionMessage message, String playerName) throws NullPointerException, NoSuchElementException, com.sun.jdi.InvalidModuleException
      This method is called by the Controller object to handle an action message incoming from a player.
      Parameters:
      message - The command pattern message that needs to be executed
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the passed message is null
      com.sun.jdi.InvalidModuleException - When the action is not actually valid
      NoSuchElementException
